primair_narratief_programma.beschrijving: God delivers His people from the 'Babylon' of modern militarism and industrialism through a process of comfort and active preparation of His way.

subject.identificatie: God (initially), shifting to the 'People of God' (Minderheit des Bewusstseins).
tekstueel_bewijs: Gott traut uns zu, dass wir den Weg des Messias bereiten

object.identificatie: Justice, Peace, and the 'Beauty of God' (Heimkehr/Gerechtigkeit).
tekstueel_bewijs: der Messias kommt auf keinem anderen Weg als dem der Gerechtigkeit

zender.identificatie: The Voice/God (as the source of the mandate).
tekstueel_bewijs: Es ruft eine Stimme: In der Wüste bereitet dem Herrn den Weg

ontvanger.identificatie: The 'People of God' (Christians, Greenpeace, Amnesty, etc.).
tekstueel_bewijs: Ich spreche von dem Volk Gottes... einer täglich wachsenden Minderheit
ontvanger.positie_hoorder: The hearer identifies as the Subject (Roadworker) and Receiver (Comforted).

helper.identificatie: Memory of the Exodus; the 'Beauty of God'.
tekstueel_bewijs: Diese Stimme erinnert an die Grunderfahrung des jüdischen Volkes
helper.rol_van_god: God is the Sender and the Goal, but the Hearer is the primary Subject of the 'roadwork'.
helper.rol_van_geest: Indwelling power (Gott will in uns geboren werden).

tegenstander.identificatie: Militarism (NATO), Industrialism, Banks, Social Inequality, and 'Lethargy'.
tekstueel_bewijs: Wann werden wir frei vom Wahnsinn unserer Herren
tegenstander.toelichting_ernst: The opponent is a systemic 'Death' (Todeswissen) that rules the world.

secundair_narratief_programma.beschrijving: The ethical preparation of the world for the Messiah's arrival.
secundair_narratief_programma.subject: The Hearers (The Minority of Consciousness).
secundair_narratief_programma.object: Social justice and the leveling of class differences.
secundair_narratief_programma.toelichting_verhouding: The sermon suggests the Messiah cannot come unless the people first prepare the way (synergism/conditional).

voorbeelden_mens_subject: Was tun wir aber mit unserm Todeswissen?

voorbeelden: Es muss die Unbegehbarkeit der Welt anders werden
Sie wollten ihre Privilegien lieber behalten
mit immer klarerem Wissen von dem Tod
verstehen nichts von den komplizierten Notwendigkeiten

modale_analyse.modale_interpretatie: The sermon focuses heavily on the obligation (Devoir) to act against systemic evil, while acknowledging a lack of power (Pouvoir) that is only partially solved by 'participation' in God's beauty.

semiotisch_vierkant_analyse.beweging_in_preek: From S2 (Babylon) to ~S1 (Cheap comfort) to ~S2 (Resistance) as the path to S1.
semiotisch_vierkant_analyse.theologische_resolutie: Resolution is found in 'messianic work'—human action that makes God's glory visible.
semiotisch_vierkant_analyse.ernst_van_s2: Very high; Babylon is seen as a literal, lethal threat.

diagnostische_evaluatie.classificatie_toelichting: While it uses theocentric language of 'God's comfort,' the engine is highly anthropocentric (Political/Social Moralism). The coming of the Messiah is narratively contingent on human 'roadwork'.

indicatoren_moralisme.tekstueel_bewijs: Es muss die Unbegehbarkeit der Welt anders werden, damit der Messias kommen kann.

indicatoren_genade.tekstueel_bewijs: Gott will sein Volk trösten. Die Strafzeit soll zu Ende gehen.

exemplarisme_check.beschrijving: The Jewish people in exile and the Exodus generation serve as the blueprint for modern political resistance.
exemplarisme_check.alternatieve_lezing: God is the one who levels the mountains (Christus Victor), not the people through Greenpeace.

identificatie_patroon.effect_op_hoorder: Activates a sense of political responsibility but may increase the 'Ohnmacht' (powerlessness) if the 'roadwork' fails.
identificatie_patroon.theologische_implicatie: Soteriology is fused with social ethics (Social Gospel).

narratieve_coherentie.coherentie_beschrijving: Strong internal logic between the metaphor of Babylon and modern political critique, but weak integration of the 'Gospel' as a finished work.
spanning_punten: God tröstet vs. Wir müssen den Weg bereiten damit er kommen kann.

soteriologie.tekstueel_bewijs: sodass wir Anteil an Gottes Macht bekommen

pneumatologie.competentie_schenking: The Spirit (implied) gives the competence to resist 'Babylon'.

aanbevelingen.actantiele_audit_samenvatting: The sermon reassigns the Subject role of 'preparing the way' from God/John the Baptist to the modern political activist, making the arrival of the Messiah dependent on social reform.

subject_herpositionering.huidige_probleem: The hearer is the subject of 'making the world walkable'.
subject_herpositionering.voorgestelde_herpositionering: God is the one who levels the mountains of our sin and systemic evil in Christ.
subject_herpositionering.voorbeeld_revisie: Instead of 'We must level the valleys so He can come,' use 'Because He has come and leveled the abyss between us, we now walk in His light.'

identificatie_herstel.voorgestelde_identificatie: Hearer as the 'Exiled' who is carried home by God.
identificatie_herstel.strategie: Emphasize the passivity of the 'Receiver' in the primary act of salvation.

modale_balans.concrete_suggestie: Focus on how the 'Beauty of God' actually transforms the heart, rather than just being a 'vision' to work toward.

tegenstander_intensivering.huidige_status: The opponent (Death/Militarism) is already very strong.
tegenstander_intensivering.theologische_rationale: The sermon correctly identifies the 'Heavy Opponent'.

narratieve_hierarchie_herstel.probleem: Ethics (Program 2) is the condition for Soteriology (Program 1).

aanbevelingen.slotopmerking: A powerful prophetic critique of the 1980s context, but structurally leans toward a 'synergistic moralism' where human social action is the prerequisite for the epiphany of God.

comparatieve_analyse.verschil_met_retorische_analyse: Rhetorically, it is a 'comfort' sermon; semiotically, it is a 'recruitment' sermon for social work.
comparatieve_analyse.verschil_met_exegese: Exegesis would note that 'Prepare the way' in Isaiah is a call to the heavenly council or God's own power, not a social program.
comparatieve_analyse.unieke_inzichten_greimas: Reveals that the 'Messiah' is actually a passive actant waiting for the 'Subject' (the people) to finish the road.

appendices.notities: Sermon by Dorothee Sölle, reflecting her 'Political Theology' where the actantial subject is often the 'suffering/acting human' in solidarity with God.
